item.title: Black Party Hat
item.dc:creator: @marcelius19 marcelius19
item.description:
@marcelius19 wrote:

I don’t know why you keep bringing up people not giving a fuck about me, why do you need reassurance? I don’t care if anyone ‘gives a fuck about me’, why is it even relevant? I didn’t give a fuck about Jagex but I still played their game for years, I honestly don’t understand why you’re trying to put across but then again that’s not surprising.

Because I don’t understand Why people keep running a server when your hated, where the pleasure? where is the appreciation? why do you waste you money in a game where noone gives a fuck about what you are doing to it.

[Quote]
Yes, for 2 weeks before people got sick of the corrupt administration, downtime and so on and began to leave. You then realised what was happening and decided to quickly infect as many people as you could. Any hyped up PK server gets popular, look at BeyondRSC or Last Stand. It’s not difficult. When people still want to play your server several months later come back to me. [/Quote]

Wrong. 2 week we still had 50 to 80 people online, weekends it went over 100 again. people hated the downtime but they didn’t leave, ch3rry and miles are the reason why we been “corrupted admins” I also know you made the same choice when you had them on your neck after a while you decided to ban them anyway. I infected people because I don’t give a shit about them 3-2 weeks from start. the server had been down for 1 week before I infected with St0rk PK. You should get some facts before you open your mouth.

We named our server St0rpk and Hixk allowed us and wished us goodluck. and the name didn’t do shit honestly we never. WE advertised on mopar ONLY nowhere else and we hit 100 day 3. and the bets part was we spread the word about sto pk replicate 2-3-4 month before we released. so people was waiting for it everyone knew about it, so honestly the name didn’t do much to help. The reason why we made stork because it was awesome when we played it not because of the player count!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Party Hat
item.dc:creator: @marcelius19 marcelius19
item.description:
@marcelius19 wrote:

you had no drama because you first week was with 30 players top. We had 110 thats a different or?

If you really wanna know, the source was unstable but we had the help to fix it if we wanted, but crooks and I decided that This is actually quite boring to host a RSC server. We had stable player base between 70-110.

You can’t compare your server nor beyond nor any other server because we are the only server that had 110 online on day 2-3! Thats not the point you just trying to twist this around but thats not working because the fact is still that YOU are not needed nor am I. What is different between You and Me is that I accept it and don’t hang on to stuff were I’m not needed You and the other hand still run RSCEmulation in your second? or first year and you know people don’t give a fuck about you.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Party Hat
item.dc:creator: @marcelius19 marcelius19
item.description:
@marcelius19 wrote:

[quote author=marcelius19 link=topic=463022.msg3395418#msg3395418 date=1289321821]I’m pretty sure he didn’t mean the sprite he only meant the item your fucking retard.

So why are sprite files being mentioned? If he didn’t mean it why did he write it?

[quote author=marcelius19 link=topic=463022.msg3395418#msg3395418 date=1289321821]Your so fucking annoying so judgmental. your a piece of crap I mean if you leave RSCEmulation and someone else would continue no1 would cry, seriously think about it what are you to the community? if you leave right now? no one would care again you running a server for “other people” and the “other people” hate you and don’t care if you leave.

Try it you will see im right, do a to early April fool tell them you left and demod your self and see, your nothing noone cares about you[/quote]
It sounds like you’re describing yourself when yet another one of your servers collapses. When will your next attempt be?[/quote]

I can only take a that a joke because I really lol’d there.
“collapse” ? I lost interest as I said before if we would kept on running & develop the shit we would have more online then you have right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Party Hat
item.dc:creator: @marcelius19 marcelius19
item.description:
@marcelius19 wrote:

Why do you need to touch the sprites at all? Just create a new item entity (which you copied from an original Party Hat) and change the colour mask.

I’m pretty sure he didn’t mean the sprite he only meant the item your fucking retard.
Your so fucking annoying so judgmental. your a piece of crap I mean if you leave RSCEmulation and someone else would continue no1 would cry, seriously think about it what are you to the community? if you leave right now? no one would care again you running a server for “other people” and the “other people” hate you and don’t care if you leave.

Try it you will see im right, do a to early April fool tell them you left and demod your self and see, your nothing noone cares about you
